LanguageData.Estate_TechArcLamps.label: carbon arc lamps
LanguageData.Estate_TechArcLamps.description: Use a simple voltage ignition system to create voltaic lights.
LanguageData.Estate_TechCandleLights.label: wax-powered lighting
LanguageData.Estate_TechCandleLights.description: Allows you to create wax from meat at cooking stations and construct wax-fueled candelabras and chandeliers.
LanguageData.Estate_TechEdisonLights.label: tungsten-filament lamps
LanguageData.Estate_TechEdisonLights.description: Allows the crafting of electric lamps with tungsten-filaments.
LanguageData.Estate_TechGasLights.label: gas-powered lights
LanguageData.Estate_TechGasLights.description: Generate and use gas to maintain simple light fixtures.
LanguageData.Estate_TechMusicLow.label: record player
LanguageData.Estate_TechMusicLow.description: Allows you to craft gramophones, antique music playing devices.
LanguageData.Estate_TechMusicMed.label: basic radio
LanguageData.Estate_TechMusicMed.description: Allows you to construct basic radio systems that double as basic communication points.
LanguageData.Estate_TechRefrigeratorBasic.label: electric refrigeration
LanguageData.Estate_TechRefrigeratorBasic.description: Allows you to build electric refrigerators to store meals.
LanguageData.Estate_TechWoodStoveFurnace.label: wood stove furnace
LanguageData.Estate_TechWoodStoveFurnace.description: Allows you to build wood-fueled stove furnaces to heat rooms and cook meals.
LanguageData.Industrial_Telegraph.label: telegraph
LanguageData.Industrial_Telegraph.description: Decode the mysteries of telecommunication. The telegraph allows contact with other communities.
